item.title: LAVISH is bringing a new standard of high-end catering to Singapore
item.description:
The renowned catering company, LAVISH, celebrated its 18th anniversary with a gala in late January. The event served as a platform for the brand’s revitalization and showcased their forward-thinking approach to catering, blending culinary arts with technology and science. LAVISH is well-regarded for its expertise in catering a variety of events, from large-scale conferences and corporate gatherings to intimate private dinners and celebratory functions. Source: LAVISH. The gala dinner was held..
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/lavish-is-bringing-a-new-standard-of-high-end-catering-to-singapore/

item.title: The Ottomani offers a fresh and personalized dining experience with a modern twist on Middle Eastern cuisine
item.description:
The Ottomani, a new Middle Eastern supper club in Singapore, offers a unique dining experience reminiscent of a time when personalized service was paramount. The restaurant is a collaboration between The Dandy Partnership, known for bringing dining concepts like Neon Pigeon, Summerlong, and Fat Prince to Singapore, and Executive Chef Nic Philip. Chef Philip, who honed his skills at renowned London establishments such as The Clove Club (#26 on the World’s 50 Best list) and Yotam Ottolenghi’s Michelin-starred Nopi, brings his extensive expertise in Middle Eastern flavors and ingredients to Ottomani...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-ottomani-offers-a-fresh-and-personalized-dining-experience-with-a-modern-twist-on-middle-eastern-cuisine/
